resources.string: Data saving mode is not supported under Android 7.
When designing a widget, storage permission is required to proceed with the design by substituting it into the wallpaper you actually use.\n\nYou can use the app even if you reject the permission.
Refresh doesn\'t work on the Widget

If device using power saving mode or data saving mode., widget doesn't refresh.
\You can disable data saving mode in setting, or detour to allow access to the genshin resin widget on the next screen.

This permission allows the app to access the notifications the device receives, but the genshin resin widget does not use the notification reception service other than for HoYoLAB data reception purposes, and never accesses the user's personal information.

Genshin resin widget recommends data saving mode deactivation.
When using the HoYoLab account, Press HoYoLab Account button.\nWhen using the Google, Apple, FaceBook, Twitter account, Press SNS Account button.
Restart the app to apply the changes.
If Battle Chronicle error occur repeatedly, Please check if you have entered the correct "uid".
Your Real-Time Note is private and data cannot be imported. Do you want to change it to public?
If you press it one more time, you can shut down the app!
Failed to communicate with HoYoLAB.. The error code is %s! If you share it with the developer, it helps to solve it!
Can\'t read character information. Please check again uid, cookies, and server!
Error occurred in HoYoLAB\'s database, so can\'t get Real-Time Note !
Tried too much today.. Try it again later!
Can\'t get data because it\'s a wrong cookie. Check the cookie again!
It\'s the right cookie, but can\'t get a Real-Time Note because no HoYoLAB account linked to this cookie!
Can\'t get data from other user\'s uid! Please check if the HoYoLAB account with cookies is linked to the this uid\'s Genshin account!
Can\'t receive data because Battle Chronicle is private. In HoYoLAB Settings, Please make public your Battle Chronicle!
Can\'t get Real-Time Note because no Genshin account linked with this HoYoLAB account!
HoYoLAB\'s language is not correct. Check the server or language!
Typed incorrect uid or cookie! uid should be made up only numbers!
I failed to get a Real-Time Note. It\'s an unexpected error, so I can\'t give you detailed information, Error code is %s! Please share it with the developer!
Failed to get a Real-Time Note. It\'s an unexpected error, so I can\'t give you detailed information. sorry!
Successfully changed the Real-Time Note to public! Press the save button!
Failed to change the Real-Time Note to public.. It\'s an unexpected error, so I can\'t give you detailed information, Error code is %s! Please share it with the developer!
The cookie is invalid, so failed to get in-game uid.
Got data successfully, but can\'t get in-game uid because in-game user data doesn\'t exist!
Failed to get in-game uid.. It\'s an unexpected error, so I can\'t give you detailed information, Error code is %s! Please share it with the developer!
Account linked and Checked in Successfully!
Account linked Successfully! Today already checked in!
Can\'t get data because wrong cookie. Check the cookie again!
Tried it too fast! Please try it again later!
You can\'t link without uid! Please type in "uid"!
You can\'t link without cookie! Please enter "cookie"!
It can be modified in the "Mobile data" and "Data saver" menu, and the name of the menu may vary from device to device.
Press the upper left slime to log in, and press Get Cookie at the top!
Successfully acquired cookie! Typed it automatically!
Failed to get cookie.. Please log in and try again!
Can\'t get cookie because it doesn\'t exist!
Failed to get cookie for an unknown reason..
If you can\'t see the current resins, press the refresh button at the top right of widget.
App is not allowed to get wallpaper image because storage access permission are not allowed.
This is a notification sent to inform travelers of each pure resin!
This is a notification sent to inform travelers of their daily check-in at HoYoLAB!
Already finished today\'s daily check in!
Failed HoYoLAB check-in. I\'ll try again in 30 minutes!
This is a notification sent to travelers when the expedition is complete!
Traveler! All the expedition is complete!
This is a notification sent to travelers when the realm currency is full!
Traveler! Now full of realm currency!
You can\'t use it\nwithout user information!
- You can change the font size of widget in Widget Design.\n
